name: maslim360-store
description: A full-featured, production-ready e-commerce web application

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter backend type-check && pnpm --filter frontend type-check
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
